# Schedule of the Academic Year

The academic year in Hungary starts in September and is built up of two semesters: autumn and spring semesters. Both semesters start with a registration period which is followed by the study period and an examination period afterwards. [Details in Hungarian.](https://btk.unideb.hu/tanevbeosztas)
 
## I. (AUTUMN) SEMESTER {.unnumbered}

- Registration period: 2 -- 6 September, 2024 (Monday-Sunday)
- Study period: 9 September -- 13 December, 2024 (14 weeks)
- Autumn break: 21 -- 25 October, 2024 (1 week)
- Exam period: 
    - 16 -- 20 December, 2024 (1 week)
    - 6 January -- 14 February, 2024 (6 weeks)

## II. (SPRING) SEMESTER {.unnumbered}

- Registration period: 10 -- 14 February, 2025 (Monday-Sunday)
- Study period: 17 February -- 23 May, 2025 (13 weeks)
- Spring Break: 7 -- 11 April, 2025 (1 week)
- Exam period: 
    - 26 May -- 11 July, 2025 (7 weeks)
